title: Create visual apartment layout grid component in Owner Dashboard

requirements.summary: Create a visual apartment layout grid component (DaireGorunumu.tsx) that displays all apartments in an interactive grid/card layout showing apartment names
acceptanceCriteria: Component displays apartments in a responsive grid layout (e.g., 3-4 columns on desktop, 2 on tablet, 1 on mobile)
Each apartment is rendered as a card showing daireAdi prominently
Grid uses consistent spacing and styling matching OwnerDashboard patterns
Component integrates with useListApartments React Query hook to fetch apartment data
Loading and empty states are handled with appropriate Turkish messages

file_operations.description: Create a new visual apartment grid component that displays apartments in a responsive card-based layout. Each card shows daireAdi prominently with consistent styling. Integrate with useListApartments hook from useQueries.ts to fetch apartment data. Handle loading states with a skeleton grid and empty states with Turkish message 'Henüz daire eklenmemiş'. Use shadcn/ui Card components for consistent styling with OwnerDashboard. Apply responsive grid layout using Tailwind CSS (grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 xl:grid-cols-4). Verify the shadcn/ui component library's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Integrate the DaireGorunumu component into the OwnerDashboard page as a new section titled 'Daire Görünümü' positioned after the apartment management section
acceptanceCriteria: New section appears in OwnerDashboard with Turkish header 'Daire Görünümü'
Section is positioned logically within the dashboard layout with consistent spacing
Visual grid component displays all apartments from the building
Section maintains responsive design consistent with other dashboard sections

file_operations.description: Add a new section to OwnerDashboard after the existing apartment management section. Import DaireGorunumu component and render it within a section with the heading 'Daire Görünümü'. Use consistent spacing (mb-8) and Card wrapper patterns matching existing sections. Position the section after the ApartmentsList component but before the AnnouncementsList section. Ensure responsive layout is maintained using the existing container and grid patterns.

requirements.summary: Add visual indicators to apartment cards showing occupancy status (Boş/Dolu) by checking if any user's daireId matches the apartment's daireId
acceptanceCriteria: Each apartment card shows occupancy status (Boş/Dolu) with appropriate visual styling
Occupied apartments display a different badge variant (e.g., success/primary) than vacant ones (e.g., secondary/outline)
Component cross-references apartment data with building user list to determine occupancy
Status indicator uses Turkish labels ('Boş' for vacant, 'Dolu' for occupied)

file_operations.description: Add occupancy status indicators to apartment cards. Import useListBuildingUsers hook from useQueries.ts to fetch user data. For each apartment, check if any user in the building has a matching daireId. Display a Badge component on each card showing 'Boş' (secondary/outline variant) if no matching daireId is found, or 'Dolu' (default/primary variant) if a user is assigned. Position the badge in the top-right corner of each card. Verify the shadcn/ui Badge component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Implement hover interactions on apartment cards that display additional information in a tooltip or popover, including formatted creation date
acceptanceCriteria: Hovering over an apartment card reveals additional details in a tooltip/popover
Tooltip displays formatted creation date using Turkish date formatting
Hover effect uses smooth transitions consistent with existing UI patterns
Tooltip/popover styling matches shadcn/ui component library patterns

file_operations.description: Add hover interactions to apartment cards using shadcn/ui Tooltip or HoverCard component. Wrap each card with the hover component to display additional details on hover. Show formatted olusturmaTarihi using Turkish locale date formatting (e.g., new Date(Number(apartment.olusturmaTarihi / BigInt(1000000))).toLocaleDateString('tr-TR')). Include smooth CSS transitions for hover effects (transition-all duration-200). Add subtle hover state styling to cards (hover:shadow-lg hover:scale-105). Verify the shadcn/ui Tooltip/HoverCard component's usage instructions before implementing.
